description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget screen for admin order management. It includes UI components such as headers, placeholders, and role-based authorization logic, with imports from Flutter and project-specific modules.

classes.name: AdminOrdersManagementScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the admin orders management page with header, filters, and action placeholders. Implements role-based authorization and responsive layout.

classes.name: _NeonSectionHeader
classes.description: A widget that displays a styled header section with icon, title, and subtitle, using gradient and shadow effects.

classes.name: _NeonPlaceholder
classes.description: A widget representing a neon-glow styled placeholder row with an icon and descriptive text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the admin orders management screen, including app bar, header, placeholder items, and responsive layout, with role-based access control.

methods.name: __NeonSectionHeader
methods.description: Constructor for the neon header widget with color, icon, title, and subtitle parameters.

methods.name: __NeonPlaceholder
methods.description: Constructor for the neon placeholder widget with text parameter.
